relation: Great for these types of students
Way too small. There is really nothing to do here except play sports. I would not recommend attending Tiffin.
pageTitle: Tiffin University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {23715=The Degree Completing Program is very affordable to students who have had their studies interrupted. It is easy to navigate and get into, if you have basic online proficiency. I am in the Business Administration DCP, and find that it is well-designed for the working adult. The courses are given one at a time for focused study, while maintaining full-time enrollment status. This is the best feature, and makes other drawbacks worth it. The admissions staff is exceptional. Financial aid is lukewarm, especially for online students; it is best to have a backup plan for financing graduation. However, they say that online students enjoy a lower tuition cost then the traditional student does. Pell and FSEOG, yes--early FAFSA on Jan.1 gets the rewards--Perkins, no., 24775=The online forums are mandatory; the quality of discussion with fellow students is very low. Many do not have critical thinking skills and have poor spelling and grammar. The online teacher tolerated multiple incidents of a student plagerizing another students work in the forum posting. This led me to conclude that the instructor is not really reading the posts. If this kind of thing does not bother you, the online program certainly gets the job done, but it is more suitable for the independent-minded person., 147182=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Holly from Lombard, IL 07/13/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 8 out of 9 people found this review useful. 2 of 36 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Athletes and highly motivated scholars Tips for prospective students Do not be shy the first couple weeks of school because that is when most of your friendships bloom. Also, ask your professors for help... that is what they are there for! Bang for the buck I have learned so much from my professors. Again, it is the effort you put into it though. Many professors will give you their home phone number and help you outside classroom hours, which is extremely useful if you are uncertain about an assignment. Am enjoying being here Even though the campus is ultra small, it makes getting to know people a lot easier. Since roughly 85% of
